name: Tdas Miner
description:
You can mine ores and craft better tools.

For more info about this game check out the Dev Blog.

Crafting a better pickaxe makes mining faster and the rarest pickaxes can mine multiple blocks at once! There´s 28 types of blocks, 3 fluids and 4 layers (dirt, stone, granite and obsidian). Every ore has its type of pickaxe. :D
